properties.areaDesc: Northern Washoe County; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Surprise Valley California
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 7:45AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Lessening snow potentials.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations from a dusting to
around an inch. Amounts 2-3 inches near Lassen National Park and
Cedar Pass.

* WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties and
Surprise Valley California including Susanville, Portola, and
Cedarville.

* WHEN...through 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute. Expect chain
controls and delays going over Sierra passes such as Fredonyer
and north of Susanville on Highway 395.
properties.instruction:
Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during
periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to
reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since
it takes longer to stop on slick roadways.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING
